subject: Test Failed to run in Ant JUnit task.
msgSnippet: Hello, I am able to run a test case from EClipse GUI without any problem but it failed to run from ant junit task. I am using EClipse 3.3, Junit 4.4 and Ant
messageBody:
Hello,

I am able to run a test case from EClipse GUI without any problem but
it failed to run from ant junit task. I am using EClipse 3.3, Junit
4.4 and Ant 1.7.0. The error message is:

Buildfile: C:\mydoc\java_dev\pktest\build.xml
test:
[junit] Running build/test/com/test/pk/t1Test
[junit] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec

BUILD FAILED
C:\mydoc\java_dev\pktest\build.xml:20: Test
build/test/com/test/pk/t1Test failed

It just tells "Errors: 1". I attach debug info and build.xml. Can
anyone shed some light on this?

Thanks a lot and happy Holidays!
Andrew


Build.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- ====================================
project pktest
================================================ -->
<project name="pktest" default="test">
<property name="src" value="src" />
<property name="src.test" value="test" />
<property name="build" value="build" />
<property name="classes" value="${build}/classes"/>
<property name="test" value="${build}/test"/>
<property name="java.class.path" value="C:\Program
Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\lib"/>

<path id="project.class.path">
<pathelement path="${java.class.path}/"/>
<pathelement path="${classes}/"/>
<pathelement path="C:\mydoc\grid\junit-4.4.zip"/>
</path>

<target name="test" description="Perform Unit testing" >
<junit printsummary="on" haltonerror="true" >
<test name="${test}/com/test/pk/t1Test"/>
<classpath refid="project.class.path" />
</junit>
</target>

</project>
